news_title: Aevo's Ribbon Vaults Lose $2.7M in Oracle Exploit
news_subtitle: Crypt News Legacy DeFi options vaults from Ribbon Finance were drained of approximately $2.7 million on Dec. 12. The attack targeted smart contracts that remained active on Ethereum despite Ribbon's 2023 rebrand to Aevo. Security analysts traced the exploit to a Dec. 6 oracle upg...

news_title: BitMine Adds $321M in Ethereum to Corporate Treasury
news_subtitle: Ethereum News BitMine Immersion Technologies purchased 102,259 Ethereum worth approximately $321.1 million last week as the firm continues accumulating toward its goal of holding 5% of the asset's total supply. The NYSE American-listed company disclosed Monday that its holdings n...

news_title: JPMorgan Launches Ethereum Money Market Fund Tuesday
news_subtitle: Ethereum News JPMorgan Chase will offer an Ethereum-based tokenized money market fund to qualified investors starting Tuesday. The private fund, called My OnChain Net Yield Fund (MONY), will be seeded with $100 million of the bank's capital before becoming accessible to eligible ...

news_title: Ripple Expands RLUSD Stablecoin to Ethereum L2 Networks
news_subtitle: Ripple News Ripple is testing its RLUSD stablecoin on Optimism, Base, Ink, and Unichain ahead of plans to launch on layer-2 blockchains next year. The payments-focused blockchain firm tapped Wormhole and its Native Token Transfers token standard to enable cross-chain movement, ac...

news_title: J.P. Morgan Launches Tokenized Money Market Fund on Ethereum
news_subtitle: MONY makes J.P. Morgan the first GSIB to offer a public blockchain money market fund. Investors can subscribe, redeem, and hold fund tokens using cash or stablecoins. The fund combines U.S. Treasury safety with blockchain-enabled transparency and efficiency. J.P. Morgan Asset Man...
